s: The Briner resolves the biggest challenge to successful brining - floating food! Simple design, easy to use, easy to clean and produces great results. The 22 qt Briner holds turkeys up to 20+ lbs, 4 or 5 whole chickens or pork shoulders, a few large racks of ribs, or an entire days catch of fish.

t: Anyone own The Briner ? | The Virtual Weber Bulletin Board
s: This being turkey season , a lot of folks are wet brining. This gadget appears to be very useful, in that it solves the problem of floating meat. The Briner I'd like to use this for whole chicken also. But I already have an 18 qt container that I used one time to brine a turkey...
